hero_title: Data Scientist specialized in AI and NLP
hero_description: Data Scientist — exploring, building, and connecting ideas from data to cloud
projects_subtitle: A selection of my end-to-end data & AI projects
skills_subtitle: Core strengths in data, ML, NLP & engineering
about_intro: Final-year Data Science student at ENSAI, with a strong background in mathematics, statistics, and machine learning.
about_text: I'm a Data Scientist with experience in statistical modeling, supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP, and Generative AI. My academic path shaped a rigorous and analytical mindset.
about_desc: I design scalable, modular pipelines — from preprocessing to deployment — with a focus on robustness, automation, and interpretability.
about_extra: I enjoy solving end-to-end real-world problems, blending classic ML with modern tools like LLMs, embeddings, and vector databases, always aiming for clarity and clean, maintainable code.
about_status: Currently interning at Square Management (Paris), working on applied research projects combining AI, NLP, and enterprise knowledge modeling.
about_education: ENSAI – National School for Statistics and Information Analysis
about_degree: Master's in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
skills_adv_data_science_desc: Python (pandas, numpy, polars), SQL, statistical modeling, automated EDA.
skills_adv_ml_desc: Supervised & unsupervised, time series, advanced feature engineering, deep learning (RNN, LSTM), interpretability (SHAP, LIME).
skills_adv_nlp_desc: Hybrid RAG pipelines, LLMs (LangChain, Hugging Face), embeddings, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, RAG evaluation.
skills_adv_dataeng_desc: Modular pipelines, ETL, CI/CD, orchestration, Git, Python APIs (FastAPI, Streamlit).
skills_adv_cloud_desc: AWS, GCP: deployment, storage, pipeline orchestration.
skills_adv_viz_desc: Matplotlib, Plotly, interactive dashboards (Streamlit), clear documentation.
project1_desc: Local NLP pipeline to moderate user reviews: BERT-based toxicity detection, summarization, rewriting — no cloud, no compromise on privacy.
project1_desc_long: This project is a fully local, explainable moderation pipeline that scrapes reviews, detects harmful content using BERT, generates smart summaries with T5, and rewrites toxic comments for publication — all with no external API. It includes a Streamlit dashboard and a FastAPI backend, and is designed to be modular, privacy-preserving, and production-ready.
project2_desc: Intelligent playlist recommender mixing Word2Vec & NLP embeddings. Interactive app, filters by genre & duration, exportable results.
project2_desc_long: This hybrid music recommender blends collaborative filtering (Word2Vec) and content-based embeddings (SentenceTransformers). It includes a Streamlit interface with search, sliders to adjust semantic weights, and genre/duration filters. The system is 100% local, customizable, and ready for large datasets. Visual explanations and CSV exports are also available.
exp1_desc: Benchmarking RAG architectures to convert internal reports into a queryable knowledge base.
contact_text: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Drop me a message!
